net.webpdf.ant.task

Interface TaskIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupTask, OperationTask, Task, Variable, WebPDFTask

    public interface TaskIntf
    An implementing class shall provide all mechanisms for a containing parent task to initialize and execute it's children.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Called by the project to let the task do its work.
      IterativeTaskFile getFiles()
      Returns the container managing the iterative file progression of this task.
      AntLogger getLogger()
      Returns the logger used by this task.
      TaskConfiguration getTaskConfiguration()
      Returns the top level task configuration of this sub task.
      VariableMap getVariables()
      Returns the variables used by this task.
      void setFiles(IterativeTaskFile files)
      Sets the configuration container managing the iterative file progression in between the encapsulated tasks and sub tasks.
      void setTaskConfiguration(TaskConfiguration taskConfiguration)
      Passes the top level task configuration on to this sub task.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException
        Called by the project to let the task do its work. This method may be called more than once, if the task is invoked more than once. For example, if target1 and target2 both depend on target3, then running "ant target1 target2" will run all tasks in target3 twice.
        Throws:
        org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException - if something goes wrong with the build.

      • setFiles

        void setFiles(IterativeTaskFile files)
        Sets the configuration container managing the iterative file progression in between the encapsulated tasks and sub tasks.
        Parameters:
        files - The file container this task shall be using.

      • getFiles

        IterativeTaskFile getFiles()
        Returns the container managing the iterative file progression of this task.
        Returns:
        The file container this task is currently using.

      • setTaskConfiguration

        void setTaskConfiguration(TaskConfiguration taskConfiguration)
        Passes the top level task configuration on to this sub task.
        Parameters:
        taskConfiguration - The task configuration of the top level webPDF task.

      • getTaskConfiguration

        TaskConfiguration getTaskConfiguration()
        Returns the top level task configuration of this sub task.
        Returns:
        The task configuration of the containing top level webPDF task.

      • getVariables

        VariableMap getVariables()
        Returns the variables used by this task.
        Returns:
        The variables used by this task.

      • getLogger

        AntLogger getLogger()
        Returns the logger used by this task.
        Returns:
        The logger used by this task.
